Module toysocialnetwork.toysocialnetworkfx
Package toysocialnetwork.toysocialnetworkfx.repository

Interface Repository<ID,E extends Entity<ID>>

Type Parameters:
ID - the type of the id
E - the type of the entity, it must extend Entity
All Known Implementing Classes:
FileRepository, FriendshipDBRepository, FriendshipFileRepository, InMemoryRepository, MessageDBRepository, UserDBRepository, UserFileRepository
public interface Repository<ID,E extends Entity<ID>>
Generic CRUD repository on generic entities with a generic id

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Optional<E>
    delete(ID id)
    Deletes an entity from the repository
    Iterable<E>
    findAll()
    Gets all the entities stored in the repository

    Finds an entity from the repository by id

    Finds an entity with the corresponding id from the repository by the values contained in the entity other than the id

  • Method Details

    • findById

      Optional<E> findById(ID id)
      Finds an entity from the repository by id
      Parameters:
      id - the id, must not be null
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the entity if found or null otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the id is null

    • findByValue

      Optional<E> findByValue(E entity)
      Finds an entity with the corresponding id from the repository by the values contained in the entity other than the id
      Parameters:
      entity - the entity without the id, must not be null
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the complete entity if found or null otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the entity is null

    • findAll

      Iterable<E> findAll()
      Gets all the entities stored in the repository
      Returns:
      the entities

    • save

      Optional<E> save(E entity)
      Stores an entity in the repository
      Parameters:
      entity - the entity, must not be null
      Returns:
      an Optional containing null if saved successfully or the entity otherwise (if it already exists or if the id is duplicated)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the entity is null
      ValidationException - if the entity is invalid

    • update

      Optional<E> update(E entity)
      Updates an entity from the repository
      Parameters:
      entity - the entity containing the new information
      Returns:
      an Optional containing null if updated successfully or the entity otherwise (if there is no entity with the given id or if the operation would result in a duplicated entity)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the entity is null
      ValidationException - if the entity is invalid

    • delete

      Optional<E> delete(ID id)
      Deletes an entity from the repository
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the entity to be deleted
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the deleted entity if the operation was successful or null otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the id is null

    • getLastId

      ID getLastId()
      Gets the id of the newest saved entity
      Returns:
      the id
